S

SAND - TileType
Sandy terrain to transition between LAND and SEA or represent a desert.
save() - Method in class ViewModel
Saves the current state of the research simulation to the file "_default_save.txt"
saveAs(Writer) - Method in class ViewModel
Saves the current state of the research simulation to the given writer.
Scenario - Class in researchsim.scenario
The scenario is the overriding class of the simulation.
Scenario(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Scenario
Creates a new Scenario with a given name, width, height and random seed.
ScenarioCanvas - Class in researchsim.display
Subclass of the JavaFX Canvas to represent the main elements of the Scenario graphically.
ScenarioCanvas(ViewModel, double, double) - Constructor for class ScenarioCanvas
Creates a new PortCanvas with the given dimensions.
ScenarioManager - Class in researchsim.scenario
Singleton class which manages all the scenarios items.
setContents(Entity) - Method in class Tile
Updates the contents of the tile.
setCoordinate(Coordinate) - Method in class Entity
Updates this entity's scenario grid coordinate.
setHasMoved(boolean) - Method in class ViewModel
sets if the user has moved this turn
setMapGrid(Tile[]) - Method in class Scenario
Updates the map grid for this scenario.
setScenario(String) - Method in class ScenarioManager
Sets the current scenario from the manager.
showCoordinate() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the status of if the grid coordinate should be shown
showCoordinateProperty() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the object containing the status of if the grid coordinate should be shown
showGrid() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the status of if the grid should be shown
showGridProperty() - Method in class ViewModel
Returns the object containing the status of if the grid should be shown
Size - Enum in researchsim.entities
This enum governs the base attributes of each entity.
SMALL - Size
An entity that is small in physical size.
start(Stage) - Method in class Launcher
